pt.ua.dicoogle.rGUI.client.UIHelper

Class AllowBlankMaskFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultFormatter
        • javax.swing.text.MaskFormatter
          • pt.ua.dicoogle.rGUI.client.UIHelper.AllowBlankMaskFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class AllowBlankMaskFormatter
extends javax.swing.text.MaskFormatter
    A special version of the MaskFormatter for formatted text fields that supports the field being emptied/left blank.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
